dct_description_sm: published by G.W. and C.B. Colton & Co.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Miles".
Shows topography, drainage, travel routes (including travel routes of the Israelites), land divisions among the twelves tribes of Israel, places of historical interest.
Appears in Colton's General atlas, etc.. by Colton, G. Woolworth (George Woolworth), 1855.
